title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
alternative_title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi - World's Greatest First Love, 世界一初恋 TV
description: Even though Ritsu Onodera hates to rely on family connections, he winds up taking a job as an editor at his parents’ company, Marukawa Books. To his chagrin, he’s assigned to the shoujo manga department in spite of having no interest or experience in it. And on top of that, he has an awful first impression of his high-handed editor in chief, Masamune Takano. What comes after is a story of first love full of tears and laughter.
